1.0.name: wordpress/ping
1.0.description: SwitchUp Studio's Ping Theme is designed with the end-user in mind, don't conform, do your own thing with 100% customisable colour options. Ping comes with one sidebar area with a range of customisable widgets including: archives, recent posts, recent comments, search field, and many more. If there is a feature you feel Ping is missing, don't fret, we're updating it all the time.
